anathema: Fail to work toward goals or grow in skill, relax excessively or give in to sloth
edict: Achieve goals at any cost, continually improve your abilities, establish dominance, work ceaselessly
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Droskar (The Dark Smith)](/Deities.aspx?ID=447)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Achieve goals at any cost, continually improve your abilities, establish dominance, work ceaselessly

**Anathema** Fail to work toward goals or grow in skill, relax excessively or give in to sloth

**Area of Concern**
Cheating, exploitation, toil

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=384)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76), [Metal](/Domains.aspx?ID=112), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=1442)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=1553)

- **5th**
[Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1692)

</column>
name: Droskar (The Dark Smith)
